data.text: @DrSimEvans @rplobrien @IEA It’s laughable Simon. When will West wake up to #nuclear ? Quanti volti al girono devo dirtelo ?

@DrSimEvans @IEA If you change the numbers on the Y-axis you get global life expectancy. 
or the higher the CO2 emissions the higher global happiness.

@DrSimEvans @IEA I’m not surprised.  Everything scales with population and economic growth and those keep happening, so there you are.  RE needs brand new tech to become dispatchable before it ever takes over FF.  Keep inventing!!
@DrSimEvans @IEA Clearly time to call for degrowth, and stop believing in green growth. decoupling is more than ever out of sight if we want to respect the Paris Agreement.
@DrSimEvans @IEA *from energy (not total CO2 emissions). But either way it's pretty discouraging; we (including the IEA) thought that the emissions recovery would be much slower...

@DrSimEvans @IEA Sad thing is that climate remains a crisis which is only treated as one, when there are no other crisis to be dealt with. Principles only mean so much when confronted with hard times like these.
